headline: A Journey Begins
story: Company founded by George Lam with a vision to transform the world. The team works out of a small office space in California.

headline: First Major Client
story: MTG secured its first major client, Final Destination Funeral Services which helped to establish its reputation in the industry. This partnership opened up new opportunities for the company and allowed it to expand its services and reach a wider audience.

headline: Expansion Continues
story: The company experienced significant growth and expanded its team to 50 employees. This growth was fueled by increased demand for death care services. As the company continued to innovate and deliver high-quality work, it gained a reputation as a leader in the industry and began to attract more clients and larger projects.

headline: The First Three Years
story: In 1997, the company celebrated its 3rd anniversary since its founding in 1994. Over the past three years, the company had grown from a small startup with just a few employees to a thriving business with a team of 500 and a portfolio of successful projects.
